summary: This is a July 28, 2021 letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to defense counsel in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, transmitting discovery materials. The letter includes an index of produced items, including FBI 302 notes from an interview with Maxwell, an Epstein photo book, and various custody logs and certifications.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case (20 Cr. 330). The letter transmits discovery materials related to her case, including notes from an FBI 302 interview with her.

events.title: FBI 302 Interview of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: FBI conducted a 302 interview with Ghislaine Maxwell. Notes from this interview are included in the discovery production.

events.title: Epstein Photo Book Creation/Review

events.title: Discovery Production to Maxwell Defense
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office produced a batch of discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel.

locations: 33 West 19th Street-4th Fl. New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office produced discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case on July 28, 2021, under a protective order.
The produced materials included 'Ghislaine Maxwell 302 Notes' from an FBI interview conducted on July 17, 2019.
The production included an 'Epstein Photo Book' dated June 16, 2021, designated as confidential.
The case is identified as United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (MN).
The letter confirms the government's ongoing discovery obligations in the Maxwell prosecution.
